info: Information on how to set up a command. Command group is all commands in an array. Each command has a 'response', which is a function that will be evaluated. If arguments=true, then the arguments will be passed into the function. If arguments=true and externalarguments=some value, then externalargs will be passed in first and then arguments.

response: var d = new Date(); var o = {hour: 'numeric', minute: 'numeric', hour12: true}; var ts = d.toLocaleString('en-US', o); return(ts)
arguments[0] = Number(arguments[0]); arguments[1] = Number(arguments[1]); var r = Math.floor(Math.random() * (arguments[0]-arguments[1]+1)) + arguments[1]; return(r);
var p = Number(arguments[0]); var r = ''; for(var i=0; i<p; i++){r+='[PAUSE]'}; return (r);
